title: Can Christians morally listen to satanic music like black metal? - Quora

response.answer_text: There are Christian black metal bands. It’s the same thing, but instead of sacrificing a goat to Satan they sacrifice a goat to Jesus.
Absolutely, because there are christian black metal bands. And besides, most metal in general isn’t actually satanic, they often just use symbols to promote their edgy, dark image. hope that helps!
Absolutly. Literally who cares. Also its not satanic, just the lyrics can be, but almost never condones it.
